entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense suggest nuint rather than null #68841

Closed

  • VS maxes out CPU for minutes in projects with lots of types #68842
  • SyntaxFactory.ParseToken parses incorrectly when chained implicitly with linq? #68844
  • Text font in DocumentOutline can't be changed #68809
  • WorkspacePullDiagnosticHandler should handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68797
  • unused variables not dimmed inside lambdas/delegates #68839
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33829.535 #68838

PullRequests

Created

  • Update PublishData.json #68847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove ReturnsVoidIsSetBit flag #68846
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash in interpolation handling #68845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8

Merged

  • Mitigate costly syntax tree walks in 'remove unused members'. #68843
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge features/CollectionLiterals into main #68831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind to EnvironmentFontFamily in DocumentOutLineWindow. #68811
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [LSP pull diagnostics] Handle background analysis scope options for both compiler and analyzer diagnostics #68818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • update System.CommandLine to the latest version #68549
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve parser error recovery for certain collection-literal cases #68788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Lookahead parsing for collection exprs vs. local functions. #68807
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Avoid quadratic lookup of namespace declarations #68832
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Add support for `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` #68702
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enhance the SARIF v2 log to report analyzer execution time #68607
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
